parameters.name: BackupId
parameters.description: The ID of the backup file.

parameters.name: CrossBackupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the cross-region data backup file.

>  You must specify the **CrossBackupId** parameter. Alternatively, you must specify the **StartTime** and **EndTime** parameters.

parameters.name: CrossBackupRegion
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which the cross-region data backup file is stored.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number. Valid values: any non-zero positive integer.

Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page. Valid values:

*   **30**
*   **50**
*   **100**

Default value: 30.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.
